edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.controllers

Class TerrainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.ca.rps.controllers.TerrainActivity

  • public class TerrainActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    This is a controller class for a simple Android app that runs a Rock-Paper-Scissors ecosystem model, presenting the changing system state as an animated image.
    Version:
    1.0, 2017-10-20
    Author:
    Nicholas Bennett & Deep Dive Coding Java+Android+SalesForce Bootcamp Cohort 2
